###User Defined Function###
_SoundClose

###Description###
Closes a sound previously opened with _SoundOpen.

###Syntax###
#include <Sound.au3>
_SoundClose ( $sSnd_id )


###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$sSnd_id
	Sound ID (the 'alias') as returned by _SoundOpen
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
@@ReturnTable@@
Success:	1
Failure:	0
@Error:	0 = No Error
	1 = Failure
	3 = Invalid Sound ID
@@End@@


###Remarks###
None.

###Related###
_SoundOpen
